schools.name: Harvard University
schools.description: Harvard University is a private Ivy League research university, the oldest institution of higher learning in the United States, established in 1636. Known for its academic excellence, influential alumni, and substantial endowment.

schools.name: Stanford University
schools.description: Stanford University is a leading research university, known for its academic strength, athletics, and proximity to Silicon Valley. Founded in 1885 by Leland and Jane Stanford.
schools.motto: Die Luft der Freiheit weht (The wind of freedom blows)

schools.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
schools.description: MIT is a leading research university, known for its rigorous academics and cutting-edge research in science and technology. Founded in 1861.

schools.name: University of Cambridge
schools.description: The University of Cambridge is one of the world's oldest and most prestigious universities, founded in 1209. Known for its academic excellence across sciences and humanities.
schools.motto: Hinc lucem et pocula sacra (From here, light and sacred draughts)

schools.name: University of Oxford
schools.description: The University of Oxford is the oldest university in the English-speaking world, with evidence of teaching dating back to 1096. One of the most prestigious academic institutions globally.
schools.motto: Dominus Illuminatio Mea (The Lord is my Light)

schools.name: Tsinghua University
schools.description: Tsinghua University is one of China's most prestigious universities, known for its engineering and science programs. Founded in 1911 as Tsinghua College.

schools.name: Peking University
schools.description: Peking University is one of China's most prestigious universities, known for its humanities and sciences. Founded in 1898 as the Imperial University of Peking.
schools.motto: Bo Yan Po Xin (Broaden horizons and seek knowledge)

schools.name: University of Tokyo
schools.description: The University of Tokyo is Japan's most prestigious national university, established in 1877. Known for research excellence across all disciplines.

schools.name: National University of Singapore
schools.description: NUS is Singapore's flagship university and one of Asia's leading institutions. Founded in 1905, it offers a global approach to education and research.

schools.name: ETH Zurich
schools.description: ETH Zurich is one of the world's leading science and technology universities, known for producing Nobel laureates and innovation. Founded in 1855.
schools.motto: Science for the Benefit of Humanity

schools.name: Yale University
schools.description: Yale University is a private Ivy League research university, known for its excellence in humanities, law, and drama. Founded in 1701.

schools.name: Princeton University
schools.description: Princeton University is a private Ivy League university, known for its undergraduate focus and research excellence. Founded in 1746.
schools.motto: Dei Sub Numine Viget (Under the Power of God, She Flourishes)

schools.name: Imperial College London
schools.description: Imperial College London is a world-class university focusing on science, technology, medicine, and business. Founded in 1907.

schools.name: Kyoto University
schools.description: Kyoto University is one of Japan's most prestigious universities, known for its research excellence and Nobel laureates. Founded in 1897.

schools.name: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
schools.description: HKUST is a world-renowned research university, known for its science and engineering programs. Founded in 1991.
schools.motto: Advancing Knowledge, Promoting Learning, and Nurturing Talents

schools.name: University of Melbourne
schools.description: The University of Melbourne is Australia's leading university, known for research excellence and student experience. Founded in 1853.

schools.name: Diocesan Girls' Junior School
schools.description: DGS is a prestigious all-girls primary school in Hong Kong, known for its excellent education and traditions. Established in 1860.
schools.motto: Finis Coronat Opus (The End Crowns the Work)

schools.name: St. Paul's Co-educational College
schools.description: St. Paul's Co-educational College is a renowned EMI secondary school in Hong Kong, known for academic excellence. Founded in 1965.

schools.name: St. Stephen's College Preparatory School
schools.description: St. Stephen's College Preparatory School is a prestigious boys' primary school in Hong Kong, known for its holistic education. Founded in 1906.

schools.name: Harvard Kindergarten
schools.description: A demonstration kindergarten program affiliated with Harvard's education department, focusing on early childhood development.
